statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{3 \, x - 6 , 6 \, x^{3} + 6 \, x^{2} - 3 \, x + 8 , -x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} - 4 \, x + 5 , -6 \, x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} - 3 \, x + 4 , -5 \, x^{3} - 5 \, x^{2} - x + 4\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
